    • Constructor Detail

      • RoomAgent

        public RoomAgent(int id,
         int moveRate,
         int maxMoveRate,
         int maxPatience,
         Tile destinationTile,
         Results result)
        Constructs a RoomAgent.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of RoomAgent
        moveRate - the moveRate in tiles
        maxMoveRate - the maxMoveRate for this RoomAgent, defined by Room in tiles
        maxPatience - the maximum patience in steps for this RoomAgent
        destinationTile - the destination tile where the RoomAgent wants to go
        result - the observer-Steppable Results which logs and handles the RoomAgents at the end

      • RoomAgent

        public RoomAgent()

        public int getId()
        Returns the id of an agent. This is for example needed to get which agent died.
        Returns:
        the id of the agent

      • stopMeNow

        public void stopMeNow()
        This method is for the observer to stop those agents which have reached their destinations or are dead to get them removed from the simulation. If that is not done, the simulations runs forever.

      • setStoppMe

        public void setStoppMe(Stoppable stoppMe)
        Sets the Stoppable for this agent, which allows to stop the agent and get him removed from the simulation.
        Parameters:
        stoppMe - the Stoppable to set
